comment._content: Really peaceful....no traffic or throngs of pedestrians. Really feel frozen in that moment of time.

comment._content: Must be Lijnbaansgracht 287; see a.o. picture nr 010122018289 in the Beeldbank of the Stadsarchief Amsterdam.
